events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their car on May 9th at an intersection. They requested to file a claim promptly.
Claim was reviewed by the intake team and categorized as an Auto Accident based on the description including a vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned to the auto accident claim to assist the customer and begin the claims process efficiently.
Acknowledgement message was sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
The claimant was asked to provide a police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a driverâ€™s statement for investigation.
All requested documents including photos of the accident scene and the police report were submitted by the claimant.
Investigation began focusing on verifying the details of the collision and assessing liability and damage extent.
Investigation concluded confirming customer was not at fault and damage assessed as covered under policy terms.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover repairs and rental vehicle costs for the period of repair work.
The customer responded positively thanking the agency for the quick resolution and support during the claim process.
Claim approval confirmed with full coverage for the repair costs and rental reimbursement granted.
Payment was issued to the repair shop plus the agreed rental reimbursement amount for the claimant's vehicle.
The claim was officially closed after settlement payment and confirmation that all claimant concerns were resolved.
